posts.post_content:
OK, clearing out the last of the 2015 inventory, and hoping for some new "stuff" in 2016.  In other words, get these off my desk !!!!

All cards have some sort of issue and/or affliction, but have nice images.

Please excuse the randomness in scanning order.  These are a conglomeration :rolleyes: of cards from many lots, and a pain to put together.  Front and back scans do align.

**** See Below Post ***

[url]mybuddyinc@yahoo.com[/url]

Thanks, Scott

Aside:  Tony and Doug, some sweet cards at great prices.  Surprised all aren't sold by now :confused:.   
If I weren't a "bit" low in card funds (and a "tad" concerned with stock market :( ) I'd be all over them.

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=217686&d=1452640708[/IMG]

OK, figured it out:  Bridwell and Stone are sold.

Others can be had at these prices:

1 card -- 19
2-4 cards -- 17
6-9 card -- 16
10+ cards -- 15


[url]mybuddyinc@yahoo.com[/url]


Thanks, Scott
